channel.title: wweb.dev
channel.description: Stay up to date with weekly updates, get resources for next project and read articles and tutorials about web development.

item.title: A Guide To Self-Hosting Web Apps On Ubuntu Servers
item.description: In this article, I will share a step-by-step guide on how to deploy and serve a web app to an ubuntu server. This applicable for any web app that runs on a port.
item.content:encoded: In this article, I will share a step-by-step guide on how to deploy and serve a web app to an ubuntu server. This applicable for any web app that runs on a port.
item.author: info@wweb.dev (Vincent Will)

item.title: Pure CSS Loader Generator
item.description: A code generator that helps you to create simple CSS spinners. You can choose between four different types of CSS spinners and customize them by adjusting the settings.
item.content:encoded: A code generator that helps you to create simple CSS spinners. You can choose between four different types of CSS spinners and customize them by adjusting the settings.
item.author: info@wweb.dev (Vincent Will)

item.title: Coding your own AI in 2023 with fastai
item.description: This is a guide, which focuses on the critical parts of the fastai course. I'll cover how to set up the ecosystem and how to create, train and deploy an AI model.
item.content:encoded: This is a guide, which focuses on the critical parts of the fastai course. I'll cover how to set up the ecosystem and how to create, train and deploy an AI model.
item.author: info@wweb.dev (Vincent Will)

item.title: Next.js Web App Template
item.description: A template to quickly set up a web app or SaaS. It includes the basic authentication logic using MongoDB as well as password reset logic with nodemailer.
item.content:encoded: A template to quickly set up a web app or SaaS. It includes the basic authentication logic using MongoDB as well as password reset logic with nodemailer.
item.author: info@wweb.dev (Vincent Will)

item.title: Blur Background CSS Generator
item.description: A tool to generate the CSS for a customized blur background. Afterward, you can easily copy the code and use it on your website.

item.title: Next.js Micro-blogging Template
item.description: A Next.js template for a twitter-like blog. You can write in markdown and upload images and videos.

item.title: Next.js Blog Template
